description:
MAIN GIG:

RPMC presents Cold Call and Event Marketing Conversations - a 1.5 hr video course on the strategies, philosophies, and intricacies of the dialogue, energy, and other factors in a cold call and face to face (FTF) conversation.

Whether you are just getting started with cold call or face to face marketing, a seasoned vet, or a manager looking for content on training telemarketers and event marketers, this course will give you the tools and lessons for optimizing your opportunities with potential customers!

Included in this course are:

  • 16 lectures on cold call and event marketing
  • Role play scenes for understanding how to go about a cold call and FTF conversations
  • Downloadable content pdf's and slides
  • Downloadable videos to come back to later
  • A certificate of completion!

I hope to see you in the classroom!
title: The Highest Returns from Cold Call & Trade Show Converations
